alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 5:34AM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Plain, Holden Village, Stevens Pass, Leavenworth, and Stehekin. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
